description:
You don't need Irish eyes to be smilin' this March . . . just pick up Dark Horse Extra #21! This issue is gonna come in like a lion with an all-new Star Wars strip, a prologue to the upcoming Star Wars Crimson Empire III! We've also got the continuing adventures of Ghost and Usagi Yojimbo! And don't be surprised if you break into an Irish jig when you see our cool poster for our upcoming, brand-new series, The Nevermen! Get the dish on every upcoming Dark Horse March title and the latest news from www.darkhorse.com. So if you happen to stumble upon a leprechaun, forget four-leaf clovers and pots of gold! Ask for the REAL treasure: Dark Horse Extra #21!

Story Titles

  • Ghost in "Cracked Mirror - Part 3" by Chris Warner and Chris Brunner
  • Usagi Yojimbo in "Tsuru - Part 2" by Stan Sakai
  • Star Wars: "Hard Currency - Part 1" by Randy Stradley and Isaac Buckminster Owens

I pity the April Fool who misses Dark Horse Extra #22! There's no time like the present to catch up with the continuing adventures in our Star Wars strip, and everyone's favorite ronin rabbit, Usagi Yojimbo! Don't miss the conclusion of Ghost: Cracked Mirror! And check out our must-have poster fromGrendel: Past Prime, the upcoming novel from two of the hottest names in comics today: writer Greg Rucka and artist Matt Wagner! All this, plus the dish on every upcoming Dark Horse April title and the latest news from www.darkhorse.com. Who needs chocolate bunnies or dyed eggs? We've got something much more delectable and cavity-proof: Dark Horse Extra #22!

Story Titles

  • Ghost in "Cracked Mirror - Part 4" by Chris Warner and Chris Brunner
  • Usagi Yojimbo in "Tsuru - Part 3" by Stan Sakai
  • Star Wars: "Hard Currency - Part 2" by Randy Stradley and Isaac Buckminster

May Day! May Day! Dynamic Dark Horse Extra #23 sighted! Initial reports indicate pages contain an all-new Nevermen strip. Official comment from the Nevermen: "We were never there." Alleged accomplices include the continuing adventures in theStar Wars strip, and the conclusion of Usagi Yojimbo! Suspect dressed in an exclusive Buffy the Vampire Slayer/Angel poster from the upcoming novel! Proceed with caution: this issue is armed with the dish on every upcoming Dark Horse May title and the latest news from www.darkhorse.com. All units, be on the look out for Dark Horse Extra #23!

Story Titles

  • Usagi Yojimbo in "Tsuru - Part 4" by Stan Sakai
  • Star Wars: "Hard Currency - Part 3" by Randy Stradley and Isaac Buckminster Owens
  • The Nevermen Part 1 by Phil Amara and Guy Davis

June is a Dy-no-mite! month with Dark Horse Extra #24. Think I'm pulling your leg? Nope, but I might be pulling your sock...your Sock Monkey that is! Don't miss an all-new strip from Tony Millionaire, featuring everyone's favorite wooly stuffed primate and his inebriated toy buddy the Crow in some good, twisted fun! Catch up to the mysterious Nevermen ! And don't miss the conclusion of the Star Wars strip! If it's a cool poster you want, it doesn't get any cooler than Mike Allred's Madman! All this, plus the dish on every upcoming Dark Horse June title and the latest news from www.darkhorse.com. Make your momma proud: pick up Dark Horse Extra #24!

Story Titles

  • Star Wars: "Hard Currency - Part 4" by Randy Stradley and Isaac Buckminster Owens
  • The Nevermen Part 2 by Phil Amara and Guy Davis
  • Sock Monkey Part 1 by Tony Millionaire

Story Titles

  • The Nevermen Part 3 by Phil Amara and Guy Davis
  • Sock Monkey Part 2 by Tony Millionaire
  • Angel Part 1 by Scott Allie and Eric Powell

Something wicked this way comes in Dark Horse Extra #26! Spike, and Dru, and Giles, oh my! Feast upon this month's special poster, featuring these and other favorite characters from Buffy the Vampire Slayer and other related titles coming this fall! And if that's not enough of the vamp world for ya, catch up with a little good -- and evil -- with the Angel strip! Or how about the continuing adventures of our mischievous little friend,Sock Monkey! And don't miss the mysterious conclusion ofThe Nevermen strip! All this, plus the dish on every upcoming Dark Horse August title and the latest news from www.darkhorse.com. Celebrate your independence, and choose our little firecracker: Dark Horse Extra #26!

Story Titles

  • The Nevermen Part 4 by Phil Amara and Guy Davis
  • Sock Monkey Part 3 by Tony Millionaire
  • Angel Part 2 by Scott Allie and Eric Powell

It's back-to-school time, and we've got just the topic for your "What I Did for My Summer Vacation" essay: Dark Horse Extra #27! Tell all your classmates about the groovy newSpyboy adventure in this issue. Pass a note about that brooding good-or-is-he-bad boy with part three of the Angelstrip! And even though this issue marks the conclusion of Sock Monkey strip, we're giving you an extra-special Sock Monkeyposter! All this, plus the dish on every upcoming Dark Horse September title and the latest news from www.darkhorse.com. Pack your backpack and your lunch, but don't forget your milk money, and don't forget your Dark Horse Extra #27!

Story Titles

  • Sock Monkey Part 4 by Tony Millionaire
  • Angel Part 3 by Scott Allie and Eric Powell
  • SpyBoy by Peter David and Pop Mhan

What are YOU going to dress up as this Halloween? Need some inspiration? Pick up Dark Horse Extra #28! How about wearing the costume of a renegade, as X returns in this issue with an all-new story! Or why not infiltrate your local costume store and stakeout supplies for a cool SpyBoy costume to match our cool SpyBoy strip? Want to masquerade as something sinister? Model your wear after the vampire with a special bite, as the Angel strip concludes! Check out our poster if you need a group costume for four: Aliens vs. Predator/ Witchblade vs. Darkness! All this, plus the dish on every upcoming Dark Horse October title and the latest news from www.darkhorse.com. Trick or treat? How 'bout a treat? Check out Dark Horse Extra #28!

Story Titles

  • Angel Part 4 by Scott Allie and Eric Powell
  • SpyBoy by Peter David and Pop Mhan
  • X in "Someone To Watch Over Me - Part 1" by Chris Warner and Chris Brunner

This November, you might eat some turkey or even vote for a turkey, but don't BE a turkey and miss out on Dark Horse Extra #29! In case you haven't heard, Tony Daniel is in the Dark Horse house and he's raising the roof with the debut of a three-part strip leading up to his newest project, Silke, plus a poster of the very same! That's not all that's new: check out the kick-off of an all-new Star Wars series! Plus part two of X and the latest dish on every upcoming Dark Horse November titles and news from www.darkhorse.com. This Thanksgiving, gobble up Dark Horse Extra #29!

Story Titles

  • X in "Someone To Watch Over Me - Part 2" by Chris Warner and Chris Brunner
  • Silke Part 1 by Tony Daniel
  • Ogre & Bunny by Craig Thompson

Oh, the weather outside is frightful, but Dark Horse Extra #30 is so delightful! If an exclusive sneak peek at a hot new title is on your wish list for the season, we've got it! Check out this month's poster for Bungie's Oni, featuring sexy agent Konoko, the one- woman police force destined to battle the crimelords of the future known as The Syndicate ! Also in this issue, the coolest stories this side of the North Pole with the continuing adventures of Tony Daniel's Silke, Star Wars, X, plus a brand new strip, Outlaws! Not to mention the latest dish on every upcoming Dark Horse December title and news from www.darkhorse.com. This holiday season, deck the halls with Dark Horse Extra #30!

Story Titles

  • X in "Someone To Watch Over Me - Part 3" by Chris Warner and Chris Brunner
  • Silke Part 2 by Tony Daniel
  • Outlaw 7 Part 1 by Logan Lubera, Kris Feric and Craig Yeung

Remember this time last year, when we were all wondering if the world was going to explode at the stroke of midnight on December 31, 2000? Don't be such a sucker this year pick up Dark Horse Extra #31! We've got some fantastic strips, including Tony Daniel's Silke, Logan Lubrera's Outlaw 7, and X! Also this month, we serve up a poster to you, samurai-style: Usagi Yojimbo! Plus, the latest dish on every upcoming Dark Horse January title and news from www.darkhorse.com. Go on a 2001 comics odyssey with Dark Horse Extra #31!

Story Titles

  • X in "Someone To Watch Over Me - Part 4" by Chris Warner and Chris Brunner
  • Outlaw 7 Part 2 by Logan Lubera, Kris Feric and Craig Yeung
  • Babes 'N' Arms Part 1 by Randy Stradley and Roger Petersen

Story Titles

  • Outlaw 7 Part 3 by Logan Lubera, Kris Feric and Craig Yeung
  • Babes 'N' Arms Part 2 by Randy Stradley and Roger Petersen
  • "A Punch in the Gut and a Bag of Oranges - Part 1" by Tom Fassbender, Jim Pascoe and Paul Lee

Hey little comic book soldier, this is a direct order: March into your local comics shop and pick up Dark Horse Extra #33! This issue is coming in like a lion, with roaring strips like Babes in Arms, Detective Ben Drake in Bad Oranges, and Logan Lubera's Outlaw 7. Did we mention the incredible poster from the upcoming Hellboy: Conqueror of Worm? All this, plus the latest dish on every upcoming Dark Horse March title and news from www.darkhorse.com. Be a lamb and pick up Dark Horse Extra #33, won't you?

Story Titles

  • Outlaw 7 Part 4 by Logan Lubera, Kris Feric and Craig Yeung
  • Babes 'N' Arms Part 3 by Randy Stradley and Roger Petersen
  • "A Punch in the Gut and a Bag of Oranges - Part 2" by Tom Fassbender, Jim Pascoe and Paul Lee

Who needs the Easter Bunny when we've got APES? Get your hands on Dark Horse Extra #34, you damned, dirty human, and grab your copy of our Planet of the Apes poster! Don't miss out on this exclusive sneak peek at the upcoming Dark Horse series inspired by one of the most anticipated films of the summer! Also check out one-shots featuring the Nevermen and Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Willow and Tara strips and the conclusion of Bad Oranges. All this, plus the dish on every upcoming Dark Horse April title and the latest news from www.darkhorse.com. Don't be an April Fool! Go APE and pick up Dark Horse Extra #34! It's a madhouse! A madhouse!

Story Titles

  • "A Punch in the Gut and a Bag of Oranges - Part 3" by Tom Fassbender, Jim Pascoe and Paul Lee
  • The Lone Gunmen by Paul Lee
  • The Nevermen in "Bella Moon - Part 1" by Phil Amara and Guy Davis

Calling all Buffy the Vampire Slayer fans! This month in Dark Horse Extra #35, join Willow and Tara fresh from the pages of their one-shot in this exclusive strip! Also this month, the debut of an all-new Star Wars strip, packed full of Jedi action you've come to know and love! Plus part two of the cult-hit The Nevermen! And if you're crazy 'bout Akira, this is the must-have issue with our killer poster! All this, plus the dish on every upcoming Dark Horse May title and the latest news from www.darkhorse.com.

Story Titles

  • The Nevermen in "Bella Moon - Part 2" by Phil Amara and Guy Davis
  • Star Wars: "Heart of Fire - Part 1" by John Ostrander, Jan Duursema and Dan Jackson
  • SpyGirl by Pop Mhan and Dan Jackson

Who doesn't love the month of June? School's out, summer is here, and Dark Horse Extra #36 has some kick ass strips to celebrate! This issue we launch not one but two new strips. Can't wait for the July 27, 2001 release of Tim Burton's Planet of the Apes? No problem! Check out part one of an exclusive strip previewing our upcoming series and adaptation! Bored with reruns of your favorite WB shows? Need a fix of Joss Whedon's savvy pen? How about a brand-new Angel strip scribed by the man himself? Check out this awesome lead-in to Whedon's four-issue stint on the Angel comic series beginning this Fall! Speaking of Fall titles, keep your eye out for Logan Lubera's Outlaw 7 series! In the meantime, take a sneak peek at the art in this month's poster! Plus get caught up on the action as our Star Wars strip continues. All this, plus the dish on every upcoming Dark Horse June title and the latest news from www.darkhorse.com. Don't miss it!

Story Titles

  • Star Wars: "Heart of Fire - Part 2" by John Ostrander, Jan Duursema and Dan Jackson
  • Planet of the Apes Part 1 by Scott Allie, Eric Powell and Dan Jackson
  • Angel Part 1 by Joss Whedon, Brett Matthews, Mel Rubi, Chris Dreier and Dan Jackson

It's the heat of July and do we have some saucy little firecrackers for you! Dark Horse Extra #37 brings you the explosive continuing sagas in strips from Tim Burton's Planet of the Apes, the action-packed Star Wars, and Joss Whedon's Angel ! And speaking of Angel, this month's poster gives you a sneak peek at art from the upcoming fall mini-series. All this, plus the dish on every upcoming Dark Horse July title and the latest news from www.darkhorse.com. Be a true patriot -- pledge your allegiance to Dark Horse Extra!

Story Titles

  • Star Wars: "Heart of Fire - Part 3" by John Ostrander, Jan Duursema and Dan Jackson
  • Planet of the Apes Part 2 by Scott Allie, Eric Powell and Dan Jackson
  • Angel Part 2 by Joss Whedon, Brett Matthews, Mel Rubi, Chris Dreier and Dan Jackson

Calling all Manga fans! Be sure to "Rally" around Dark Horse Extra #38 `cause we're giving you a killer Gunsmith Cats poster in celebration of our upcoming October trade paperback and special issue! Also this month, C. Scott Morse gives you a sneak peek at his upcoming NEW series, Ancient Joe! Did we mention this issue also has the must-see conclusions to strips from Tim Burton's Planet of the Apes and Joss Whedon's Angel? All this, plus the dish on every upcoming Dark Horse August title and the latest news from www.darkhorse.com. Get in the loop and be in the know with Dark Horse Extra! Dig it?

Story Titles

  • Planet of the Apes Part 3 by Scott Allie, Eric Powell and Dan Jackson
  • Angel Part 3 by Joss Whedon, Brett Matthews, Mel Rubi, Chris Dreier and Dan Jackson
  • Ancient Joe Part 1 by Scott Morse

Back-to-school can be a drag, but not if you have a little Faith -- as in Buffy the Vampire Slayer's Faith! The bitch is back and we've got her here first in an exclusive strip leading up to theFaith miniseries! Also this month, SpyBoy debuts center stage with a new series of strips while C. Scott Morse returns with continuing adventures of Ancient Joe! And don't miss this month's poster, a sneak peek at Exaxxion, our new upcoming monthly manga series from the creator of Gunsmith Cats, Kenichi Sonoda! All this plus the dish on every upcoming Dark Horse September title including special Back-to-Cool features! So bag the boring old "What I Did On My Summer Vacation" essay assignment and take down this homework assignment: pick up the September issue of Dark Horse Extra!

Story Titles

  • Ancient Joe Part 2 by Scott Morse
  • Buffy the Vampire Slayer: "Haunted - Part 1" by Jane Espenson, Cliff Richards and Julio Ferreira
  • SpyBoy in "Cavity Crisis - Part 1" by Chris Brunner and Guy Major

Gather `round little ghosts and goblins for a spook-tacular Dark Horse Extra! What could be more frightening than a man who's had too much coffee? Check out our Too Much Coffee Man poster previewing the upcoming collection. Jump into the haunting adventures of Faith in Buffy the Vampire Slayer, SpyBoy, and Ancient Joe! Plus, get the dish on every upcoming Dark Horse October title and the latest news from www.darkhorse.com. Don't get tricked by missing out on this treat -- pick up the October Dark Horse Extra!

Story Titles

  • Ancient Joe Part 3 by Scott Morse
  • Buffy the Vampire Slayer: "Haunted - Part 2" by Jane Espenson, Cliff Richards and Julio Ferreira
  • SpyBoy in "Cavity Crisis - Part 2" by Mulele Jarvis and Guy Major

This November, you'll have plenty to be thankful for, including your issue of Dark Horse Extra! Grab a cuppa joe and settle back with the debut of all new Too Much Coffee Man strip from Shannon Wheeler, previewing his forthcoming collection. Gobble up the exciting conclusions of Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Faith and SpyBoy! Plus, get the dish on every upcoming Dark Horse November title and the latest news from www.darkhorse.com. Don't be a turkey -- pick up the November Dark Horse Extra!

Story Titles

  • Buffy the Vampire Slayer: "Haunted - Part 3" by Jane Espenson, Cliff Richards and Julio Ferreira
  • SpyBoy in "Cavity Crisis - Part 3" by Gregory Titus and Guy Major
  • Too Much Coffee Man Part 1 by Shannon Wheeler

Tis' the season to pick up Dark Horse Extra! Nothing says "Seasons Greetings" like a strip from the upcoming BPRDseries, inspired by the pages of Mike Mignola's Hellboy! Have a Happy Groo Year with the hilarious one-shot from Sergio Aragon√©s! And why not chase that eggnog with a little caffiene? Don't miss the conclusion of Shannon Wheeler's Too Much Coffee Man! Plus, get the dish on every upcoming Dark Horse December title and the latest news from www.darkhorse.com. Celebrate good tidings with the December Dark Horse Extra!

Story Titles

  • Too Much Coffee Man Part 2 by Shannon Wheeler
  • B.P.R.D. Part 1 by Christopher Golden, Ryan Sook and Dave Stewart
  • Groo by Sergio Aragones

Start your New Year off right with the January issue of Dark Horse Extra. Take a sneak peek at one of the gripping pieces from the most important book you need to buy this year: the upcoming tribute collection, September 11. Remember: all the artwork, writing, editing, solicitation, and production costs have been donated by a variety of partners, and ALL proceeds from sales will go directly to relief funds. Also in this month's Extra, have a paranormal experience with the next installment of the B.P.R.D. strip, inspired by the characters from Mike Mignola's Hellboy. And Shannon Wheeler's Too Much Coffee Man was just too damn good to stop at two parts, so we're giving you an extra strip! Our resolution this year is to give you cool things, and we're starting with the Astro Boy poster featured in this issue. Plus, get the dish on every upcoming Dark Horse January title and the latest news from www.darkhorse.com. Start of 2002 right -- pick up your copy of Dark Horse Extra!

Story Titles

  • Too Much Coffee Man Part 3 by Shannon Wheeler
  • B.P.R.D. Part 2 by Christopher Golden, Ryan Sook and Dave Stewart
  • September 11 by Roger Langridge

Feel the love this February with Dark Horse Extra! Consider this issue our big valentine to you, dear readers, brought to you from a galaxy far, far away! Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones is only months away, and we've got an out-of-this-world poster previewing our cool new series, Star Wars: Jango Fett! If that's not enough Jedi action for you, check out the kick off of a brand new Star Wars strip! Also in this month's Extra, it's good to be King -- if you're The Scorpion King, that is! Check out the launch of a new strip that leads up to the comic series, inspired by the forthcoming blockbuster film! And don't forget, love is strange, and so is the activity surrounding the conclusion of the B.P.R.D. strip. Plus, get the dish on every upcoming Dark Horse February title and the latest news from www.darkhorse.com. Put a little love in your heart -- pick up your copy of Dark Horse Extra!

Story Titles

  • B.P.R.D. Part 3 by Christopher Golden, Tom Sniegoski, Ryan Sook and Dave Stewart
  • Star Wars: "Poison Moon - Part 1" by Michael Carriglitto, Adrian Sibar and Daniel Jackson
  • SpyBoy in "Wrassle Hassle - Part 1" by Norman Lee, Pop Mhan, Sanford Greene and Daniel Jackson

March right into your comic shop this month, fanboys and girls, and pick up issue #45 of Dark Horse Extra! Who needs leprucans this month when you've got a samurai rabbit? Check out an all-new Usagi Yojimbo strip from Stan Sakai! And by the time this issue is on sale, it'll be just two months until the release of the next Star Wars film! Get into the galaxy groove early with the next installment of our Star Wars series! And everyone's favorite teen superspy returns with an all-new adventure-- don't miss out on the dynamic SpyBoy! Plus, the ultimate crossover comes back for another installment, and we give you a sneak peek with a Superman/Aliens II poster! And don't forget, every month Extra dishes the latest news on every upcoming Dark Horse title for the month ! So come in like a lion, pick up your copy of Dark Horse Extra, and go out like a lamb!

Story Titles

  • Star Wars: "Poison Moon - Part 2" by Michael Carriglitto, Adrian Sibar and Dan Jackson
  • SpyBoy in "Wrassle Hassle - Part 2" by Norman Lee, Pop Mhan, Sanford Greene, Kris Kaufman and Dan Jackson
  • Usagi Yojimbo Part 1 by Stan Sakai

April showers bring May flowers, and they also bring a kick butt issue of Dark Horse Extra! You won't believe your eyes when you see this month's poster: Lone Wolf 2100! Part homage, part re-imagining, this special project is being done in close collaboration with the writer and co-creator of the original Lone Wolf & Cub manga series. Take a sneak peek! Also, don't miss the ongoing adventures of Stan Sakai's Usagi Yojimbo , the action packed Spyboy, and the next chapter in our Star Wars strip! Plus, get the dish on all the Dark Horse titles for the month ! Don't be an April's Fool-pick up issue #46 of Dark Horse Extra!

Story Titles

  • Star Wars: "Poison Moon - Part 3" by Michael Carriglitto, Adrian Sibar and Dan Jackson
  • SpyBoy in "Wrassle Hassle - Part 3" by Norman Lee, Pop Mhan, Sanford Greene and Dan Jackson
  • Usagi Yojimbo Part 2 by Stan Sakai

It's going to be one heck of a May Day with this month's Dark Horse Extra! The festivities begin with a brand new strip fromBuffy the Vampire Slayer: Willow & Tara, previewing our new miniseries penned by Tara herself, Amber Benson! Also this month, the conclusion of Stan Sakai's Usagi Yojimbo, PLUS an action-packed Star Wars strip!

Speaking of Star Wars, May also marks the release of a "little" film you may have heard of called Star Wars: Episode II -- Attack of the Clones. Get in on the Jedi fever with this month's poster, a sneak peek at our upcoming series Star Wars Infinities -- The Empire Strikes Back! All this, plus get the dish on all the May Dark Horse titles and products! Be sure to pick up issue #47 of Dark Horse Extra!

Story Titles

  • Star Wars: "Poison Moon - Part 4" by Michael Carriglitto, Adrian Sibar and Dan Jackson
  • Usagi Yojimbo Part 3 by Stan Sakai
  • Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Willow and Tara in "Demonology Menagerie - Part 1" by Andi Watson

School's out for summer and we're celebrating with a little Pip & Norton poster in this month's Dark Horse Extra! The June issue also features something that'll perk you right up: a brand new Too Much Coffee Man strip! Also this month, check out the continuing adventures of Sunnydale's favorite wiccas in Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Willow & Tara, PLUS more samurai rabbit action in Stan Sakai's Usagi Yojimbo ! All this PLUS the inside dish on June Dark Horse titles and products AND the latest web news! What a deal ! Pick up issue #48 of Dark Horse Extra!

Story Titles

  • Usagi Yojimbo Part 4 by Stan Sakai
  • Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Willow and Tara in "Demonology Menagerie - Part 2" by Andi Watson
  • Too Much Coffee Man by Shannon Wheeler and Dan Jackson

This July, we're celebrating our independence with a SPECIAL EDITION of Dark Horse Extra! Check out the SUPER-SIZED version of Buffy the Vampire Slayer, featuring parts one AND two of a brand new four-part strip series! This month's issue is also bursting at the seams with Grendel, featuring both a new strip AND a kickin' poster for the Red, White, and Black series! All this, plus the inside dish on July Dark Horse titles and products, the latest web news, and a Star Wars contest with our friends at Wizards of the Coast that you DON'T want to miss! Don't miss this bottle-rocket issue #48 of Dark Horse Extra!

Story Titles

  • Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Spike in "Rock 'n' Roll All Night (And Sleep Every Day) - Parts 1 and 2" by Jamie S. Rich, Chynna Clugston-Major and Guy Major
  • Grendel Part 1 by Matt Wagner

In issue #50 of Dark Horse Extra, we're giving you not one, not two, not three, but FOUR strips in this special SUPER-SIZED issue! If you want to rock `n' roll all night and party every day, start with our rip roarin' KISS strip, previewing the new upcoming series! Also this month, don't miss out on the second half of Grendel or the last two installments of our Buffy the Vampire Slayer strip! And if you're looking for something to redecorate with, how about our mind'blowin' Masamume Shirow poster featuring the highly anticipated Ghost in the Shell II series? All this, plus the inside dish on August Dark Horse titles and products. Don't miss issue #50 of Dark Horse Extra!

Story Titles

  • Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Spike in "Rock 'n' Roll All Night (And Sleep Every Day) - Parts 3 and 4" by Jamie S. Rich, Chynna Clugston-Major and Guy Major
  • Grendel Part 2 by Matt Wagner
  • KISS by Joe Casey, Mel Rubi, Derek Fridolfs and Dan Jackson
